name: Flats for Pets
description:
“Flats for Pets”

Game description:

Play tetris, solve puzzles and build houses for pets in hyper casual game — Flats for Pets!

Authors:

  • programmer: Timur Karev (timurkarev@mail.ru, discord: @TimurKarev#1689, https://vk.com/id34143697)
  • game designer: Valentina Vorozheikina (vvorozheikina@gmail.com, discord: @Валентина Ворожейкина#3518)
  • visual artist: Галина Павлик (Yumi Banana) (https://vk.com/yumi_banana https://www.artstation.com/yumibanana)
  • music artist: Egor Sizov (discord: FunnyN00b#5540, https://twitter.com/3GRK4)
  • animation artist: Temakichi (discord: Temakichi#1201, telegram: https://t.me/temakichi_san)

How to play:

Press arrows on keyboard to move blocks
